name: Devanga Matrimony - Matchmaking & Marriage App
description: DevangaMatrimony App, part of CommunityMatrimony, is the most trusted matrimony service for Devanga across the world. You can choose Devanga Bride and Groom Profiles from major cities across Karnataka, India and NRIs from abroad. Thousands of Devangas have successfully found their life partner here. You too can find a Perfect Match. 100% Safe and Secure App. Register FREE.  Top DevangaMatrimony App Features:  - Free Registration - User friendly interface and easy partner search options  - Get daily matches on mobile and email - Express your interest to shortlisted matches - Get instant alerts when there is a communication  - Shortlist and save potential matches - Interact with other members using the chat feature  We have members from major cities in India like Dakshin Kannada, Udupi, Bangalore, Mumbai, Thane and etc., besides Devanga NRIs from Abu Dhabi, Dubai, USA, Canada, UAE, Malaysia, Saudi Arabia, Germany, Kuwait, Singapore, Australia and Etc.  You can find brides and grooms from different Professions, Educational Backgrounds, Regions & Sub Castes, Our databases of Kannada Devangas aims to provide you with the best possible match to find the love of your life. Download app today and find your life partner!  Get the Premium Advantage  A Premium Membership means: - You can talk directly to the opposite match - You can get contact details including phone number, mail id and address.  - You can also chat live with members you like - You can send personalised messages to people you like  Devanga Matrimony App is part of Community Matrimony from Matrimony.com, which also offers language based matrimonial service like Kannada Matrimony. The app is designed keeping in mind various partner preferences that a bride or groom might have while choosing their life partner. The Devanga Matrimony App is intelligently developed to give you the best results while matching you with your life partner.  You can also find your partner from other Regional Apps of Bharat Matrimony including Kannada Matrimony.  Thousands of Devanga from across Karnataka, India and the world have found their perfect life partner here.  The Devanga Matrimony App is light and easy to use and it occupies very little phone space.  So, what are you waiting for? Download the DevangaMatrimony App Now and find your perfect life partner! Register FREE.
